name: Sean McKee
text: This is the best lunch restaurant I've been to in Montgomery yet.  Great chocolate-walnut cookie.  The coffee is excellent.  They have a good supply of quality espresso beans and a good selection of regular beans.  The coffee was done perfectly.  Nice atmosphere and friendly staff.  Thanks!

name: Timothy Nunes
text: Pleasant place. The food seemed fresh and was tasty. The coffee was decent! I just had regular brewed coffee but they offer a full coffee menu.

name: Gordon Odell
text: What I like most about Cool Beans is their creativity in cuisine.  They've taken familiar tastes and put them together in less familiar combinations and they're great!

name: Andi Lee
text: Very fun place. I adore the coffee and it's made with so much care.

name: Patrick McCurry
text: Eclectic. Tasty coffee. Reliable complimentary wi-fi. I enjoyed my work break. Very convenient to Troy Univ. in Montgomery. Near capital, etc.

name: Jason Hall
text: Delicious, accommodating to the vegetarian palate.

name: Rebecca
text: Beautiful experience

name: Rocket City Eats
text: We are so happy to see more healthy options in the Rocket City. We tried an immunity juice and Two of their delicious bowls. We would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you! We’re glad to be a part of a great community, who enjoys being organic with us. 💚

name: emichelefit
text:
I was greeted a soon as I walked through the doors. There was a sense of welcome and I knew right away I'd love whatever I decided to order. Staff was friendly, helpful on questions, and just wanted to you be happy with your order and time there.

Nothing but the best quality of juice and they make you want to come back for more!

name: Jeffrey Mc Bride
text:
BUSINESS OWNERS...

Do You Want YOUR Customers
To Come Back In More Often & INCREASE YOUR PROFITS?

HUNDREDS of MEDICAL and Business Office Workers
in Your Local Area are BACK to work and
WANT to Shop at Your Business.

I CAN help you REACH-OUT and TOUCH them
With our FREE TRIAL OFFER!

You Read Right...a FREE TRIAL OFFER!

FOR FREE, NO HASSLE INFORMATION...
Fill - In your info below & email it to:
idowhatitakes@gmail.com
Business Name:
Your Name:
Phone:
Email:

To be removed from LIST, type REMOVE in subject area.

name: Matt Jones
text: Fantastic, "clean" eats at clean juice. I've never gotten anything that wasn't fantastic. Avocado toast is ridiculous. We usually get the cashew milk latte and an acai bowl as well. The berry bowl is delicious! Great service and staff.

name: Janelle Segarra
text: Stellar service, high quality product, beautiful environment.

resp.text: Janelle, thank you so much for the review and we appreciate your business. We strive to provide the best organic product for our wonderful customers!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text: I frequent Clean Juice Twickenham every 2-3 days to get smoothies for my daughter. We started the smoothies when she was about a year and half old because she was not eating extremely well and needed some extra calories. Now she is two and LOVES the smoothies even more than when we first stared buying them. She drinks the kid’s “organic one” almost everyday. She calls it her “so good green drink!” We love Clean Juice for their yummy and nutritious smoothies AND there super friendly and awesome staff!!

resp.text: Ashleigh, we are so grateful to be a part of your family’s routine and thank you for the review!

name: David Bezerra
text:
Really loved the store and the staff.  Friendly and knowledgeable.  They helped me with the app and also to save some money.  Healthy food options and very convenient locations.
I wish it was a bit less expensive but there is a points program with the APP

resp.text: David, thanks for the review! We look forward to seeing you again. The app is great for ordering ahead as well.

name: Edie Hermes
text: Love this place and hope you will support it Huntsville! I love the Green 14 Bowl and The Intense One smoothie, plus the fresh juices. Why concentrate veggie juices if they have pesticides? Go organic! And they even pray for you when you leave a card - thanks friends!

resp.text: Edie, thank you so much for your review. We love our guests and will always provide certified organic products!

name: Tina Bonner
text: I’ve had a LOT of cold pressed juices but THIS has been by far the best juice I’ve had. Amazing juice and even more amazing people. 5 stars!!!!

resp.text: Tina, thank you. We press all of our cold pressed juices in house and are very proud of them!

name: Blake Brown
text: They were so nice! The Juicerista was very helpful with my dietary restrictions and recommended good food!

resp.text: Blake, thank you for the review. We pride ourselves on our knowledge of product and tailoring our products for people with certain dietary restrictions.

name: lynden blake
text: Always helpful when picking out my juice! Friendly staff and I love they take prayer requests.

name: Rhonda Outlaw
text: Holly at the Northlake location makes THE BEST avocado toast ever!!

name: Charla Beaty
text: I love clean juice and am so happy to have them in our town. We cleaned up our diet and Clean Juice supports that change!! Thank you, thank you, thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you! Our guests, like you, are what make it possible for us to deliver healthy options to Huntsville.

name: Mason Brewer
text: My first experience at the Clean Juice Twickenham Square location a couple of weeks ago was excellent and unforgettable. I ordered a large smoothie and an oats bowl, and both menu items were excellent and exceeded my expectations. I was helped by Molly, she and the rest of the staff were super friendly and answered all my questions thoroughly. Though it was busy when I arrived, my items were given to me quite quickly. I will definitely be visiting this location in the near future!

resp.text: Thanks, Mason! We’re so glad you had a great experience! See you next time. 😁💚

name: Sarah Ashby
text: Krovoy was SUPER helpful on our first visit!! So sweet to our girls and great info!! Will definitely come back!

resp.text: Sarah, so glad you and your girls had a great experience. Krovoy is amazing!

name: Giana Darville
text: The staff is so kind and friendly, and everything is so fresh! I love the encouraging environment and that they help me choose what’s right for me.

resp.text: Gi, thank you so much for your review. We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Mary Lohnas
text: This place has a great atmosphere and delicious food. Lily took care of me, she was very welcoming and I loved my salad! Would give 6 stars if I could.

resp.text: Aw thank you Mary!! This sweet review made our day!☺️

name: Lisa Rechisky
text: Awesome breakfast and smoothie place.  I had the So Basic and the avacado toast.  So good!

resp.text:
Lisa, thank you for the review. We hope
to see you again soon. Check out our salads at lunch or dinner!

name: Patricia Woller
text: All of the staff are friendly and inviting, the place is always clean and the products are AMAZING. I am an incredibly health conscious person, so to have something that I don’t have to even remotely wonder about ingredients makes me feel so comfortable in going out to eat - something I never get to do for that reason!

resp.text: Thanks, Patricia! We are so proud to serve you and others like you in our community. Thanks for being organic with us! 💚

name: Leah Dion
text: Love the food and drinks! Organic clean delicious.

resp.text: Leah, thank you for the review. We will always be organic!

name: Jessica
text: Tried to find this place but it must be gone

name: Mitzi Dennis
text: Everyone was friendly and made me feel that my order was important.

name: AuthenTech - Ben Schmanke
text: I love my Clean Juice! Very delicious juices and smoothies, a couple favorites are the Coffee One and Chocolate One. They don't taste over-sugary, and quite yummy. Pricing is a little high, but to be expected.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing and being organic with us, Ben! See you next time!

name: Lexi Murphy
text: Absolutely terrible, didn't get the discount advertised on the website and Facebook page! Where is clearly states " through December 31, 2019, buy a 12-pack of 1-day cleanses and save 20% or buy a 6-pack of 1-day cleanses for 2020 and get 15% off." Asked multiple times worker went and checked with the manager who never did come out and said it's only if  you buy 12 month cleanse which it doesn't say that on the fb page or on the clean juice page.

resp.text: Lexi, this is Garrett the owner. Please e-mail me at Garrett.Dennis@Cleanjuice.com. I would love to fix the issue you had in store. The promotion is a 15% discount when you pre-purchase 6, 1 day cleanse for 2020 or 20% discount when you purchase 12, 1 day cleanses for 2020.

name: Robert Hilliard
text: One of my favorite places honestly the fact that it’s 100% organic is priceless

name: Day Day
text: Wonderful. I love the concept and the fact that it’s Christian based is pretty neat. That means I know you all will take your place of business and customer service serious

resp.text: Day, thank you so much for the review. We strive to treat each customer like family. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Carla Walker
text: friendly service,  attention to detail.  My sister wont get her kuices anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review.

name: Hunter Olive
text: Great experience and very easy to decide which route is best for you!

resp.text: Hunter, thank you for the review.

name: Alan Anderson
text: Very good service and products! Especially when you are sick!

resp.text: Alan, thank you for the review. We have several items that are high in vitamin C. A natural way to help fight off and prevent colds.

name: Kimberly Hill
text: I went there two days ago and got the healthy heart smoothie. Highly recommended if you love avocado and a little sweetness in your smoothie.  I'm headed back today for something with caffeine.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kimberly!! The heart healthy one is a staff favorite too!

name: Aaron Gregory
text: Fantastic place for juices, smoothies and Acai bowls. Very friendly staff! Use their mobile app, works great

resp.text: 💚 Any reason it wasn’t a full 5 stars? We would love your feedback!

name: Lisa West
text: Delicious and guilt free!!! So great after a work out!

name: Matt Kuruvilla
text: Best acai bowl this side of the Mississippi.

name: Alison A
text: My favorite items are the beauty bowl, the green cold pressed juice, and the longevity one smoothie! I love that the items are all organic and don’t have any sugar added.

resp.text: Those really are great! Thanks for being organic with us.

name: Maria García
text: I don't usually post a bad review but this past Thursday 2/7/19 when I went to go get a smoothie and a cleanse I wasn't aware that the times changed because I usually come on my lunch break, but I got there at about 6:55 because I thought they closed at 8. The manager molly let me in but she was very rude to me in others that were in there. I assume we all came late? I understand that the closing time has changed but I customers should come first. I've meet molly before at an event that was at Belks a while ago but when I come to the store its like shes a different person. All the staff is usually nice though, but that night was just really sad and highly UNPROFESSIONAL! Just the way she was slamming the doors and the blenders and her attitude was just poor. Over all they have some nice smoothies and juices.

resp.text:
We’re so sorry to hear about this, Maria. Thank you for your feedback! As you referenced in your review, our staff is known for their great attitudes and service. Our staff is made up of this community and serves this community whole-heartedly inside and outside of the store. Please allow us to provide your next clean juice experience on us. 💚

Jason, our store manager, has been informed. 😁 We look forward to seeing you again soon! 🙏🏻

name: Andrew Phillips
text: Great service, love getting the açaí bowls!

resp.text: Andrew, thanks for the review. The Berry Bowl is my favorite açaí bowl!

name: M Fann
text: Fresh, organic juices with helpful and friendly service!

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We love being certified organic!

name: Estella Beavers
text: I love clean juice twickenham!

name: Kassidy Taylor
text: great quality food and great customer service

resp.text: Kassidyy, we will appreciate the review. Our customers are what keeps us going!

name: Rachel Osafoh
text: Very relaxed love the environment and people they have

name: Holly Romak
text: Great, healthy smoothies and other great products!

resp.text: Holly, we really appreciate the review!

name: Marcie Lewis
text: Love all the healthy delicious options!

name: Anna Catron
text: Clean juice has the yummiest juices and sweetest staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Anna.

name: Connie Ng
text: staff were super helpful and i even got a nice cooler to carry my drinks

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback, Connie! We’re grateful for you being organic with us. 💚 See you next time!

name: Angelica Askins
text: Their Avocado toast is amazing! Will definitely be back!

name: Caitlin Calvin
text: Clean location with friendly and helpful service.

resp.text: Caitlin, thank you for the review. Look forward to serving you again.

name: TP Pyt
text: Great atmosphere! Delicious juice!

name: Keaira Lloyd
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable staff!

resp.text: Keaira, thank you for the review.

name: Sylvia Moore
text: I Love This Place!

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Emily Rogers
text: Great, friendly staff. Clean, delicious juice and other options.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Emily!

name: Melissa Timm
text: Excellent products and service!

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Elizabeth Blue
text: Amazing food and juices !

name: Helen Franklin
text: Best smoothie in Huntsville!

resp.text: We agree! Thank you for the review.

name: Kersten Osteen
text: Great customer service!!!

resp.text: Kersten, thank you for the review!

name: Andrew York
text: Excellent Cacao shake

name: liyah adams
text: Love this place!

name: Angel Druse
text: Absolutely delicious !

name: Michael Healy
text: Amazing juice!

resp.text: Michael, thank you. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Allie o
text: very good !

name: Alan Anderson
text: Elderberry for the win!!

resp.text: They’re amazing!

name: Tim Harris
text: WOAH! What a disappointment... if you have no appetite or you eat like fashion model. This might be good. Portions are small *like half of a sandwich... and there "large" is like a medium anywhere else I have been.  Their fruit bowls look large but, I didn't get that.  I got a piddly bit for quite a lot.

resp.text: Hey Tim, very sorry you had a bad experience. As you can imagine sourcing all organic premium ingredients can be expensive. Hopefully you’ll give us another shot to make it right. Thanks for the feedback.

name: Lee Reese
text: Lovely little juice bar with a great menu of healthy, organic foods, smoothies and juices. The staff is super friendly and helped my make a good choice since it was my first time. Indoor and outdoor seating available and they have an app so you can order on the go.

name: Christine Golab
text: Protein toast was ON POINT! Also love the salads and all the juices and milks! I would love to add a photo, but I ate it too fast 😁

resp.text: Hey Christine, glad you liked it!

name: Nicole Havel
text:
I will say the food is delicious and clean and the juices are great. The building is spotless, and the workers are nice.
However, I asked for both my juices to be light ice or no ice (I don’t like ice). I proceeded to be charged $5.50 more for each juice, totaling $14.25 per juice. I had ordered two juices and a toast, and, with a 25% tip, my total came out to $50. I was like excuse me? I asked for a receipt and was like there’s no way I’m paying $5.50 extra each drink for asking for light ice/no ice. Just give me less juice. So ultimately I had to ask for a refund. $8.75 is a lot for a juice to begin with so to put it bluntly don’t come here on a budget.
I cook solely organic / grass fed / free range food. I know the costs are higher, but not that high. This place is a racket.

resp.text: Hey Nicole, we’re glad you like the food and the shop. As you know, premium organic food is expensive to source but it is the best for your health. Thanks for the feedback about extra juice pricing. Unfortunately that is what it costs us. I’ll be sure to reiterate with our team to make sure guests know there’s an added cost for that.

name: William Brend
text: Absolutely fresh and delicious!!  Definitely recommend the Hardcore One if you love your veggies in a juice.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you liked it!!

name: b H
text: I’ve had a pleasant experience each time I’ve visited the Greystone location. The interaction was very minimal but nice enough. I’m definitely hooked and have decided to make Clean Juice a part of my daily routine.

name: Lorenzo Carter
text: Im sad to complain that today was the first bad experience I've had at Clean Juice. I reported the incident to the manager Savanah, to no avail. Usually when entering the store its very pleasant and warm. Today when I came in it was very different. The lady at the register appeared to be annoyed and upset. She never asked if she could help me, she didn't speak, no smile or anything. She didn't say anything to me until I asked her a question about the menu. I don't know her name but she stood out to me because she was the only tall black young lady working. I told the manager it was frustrating to me because being a black man myself, i didn't expect to be treated that way by her. I have always been treated so nice and warm any other time I come in the store. I have written the corporate office and will follow up with them as soon as possible because after talking to the manager Savanah she let me know that her friendship with her employee was very strong...which let me know that I should not hold my breath for an apology.

name: Jennifer Pidgeon
text: Today was my first visit to Clean Juice off 280.  I had the Longevity One smoothie, and it was really good and filling.  I bought some cold-pressed juices that I can't wait to try.  The staff was friendly and knowledge about the ingredients and health benefits.  I'm looking forward to trying the Greenoa Bowls, wraps, and toasts.  I will definitely go back and do recommend it.

resp.text: Hey thanks for coming in! Glad you liked it. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Amy Farren
text: I got "The Spring One" smoothie, and it tasted like frozen water essentially. I thought I was getting Covid or something when I tried it, because there was no taste. Then I tried my son's Berry Bowl, and it was delicious. I have no problem paying high prices for organic food, but I would for it to at least taste good. I guess I just won't ever order their smoothies and stick to the acai bowls.

name: Ann Elizabeth Moore
text: I loved Clean Juice from the moment we stepped inside! The atmosphere is great. The juices and smoothies are stellar. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Hey Ann, thanks for the kind words.

name: Melyssa Boggan
text: Great atmosphere 😄 everyone is kind and seemed very friendly. Love the music playing. Everything looked so fresh (fruits and veggies). Juice and smoothie were delicious!!!

resp.text: Thanks Melyssa! Glad you liked it.

name: Jessica Hose
text: The store was immaculate and love the worship music playing. The girls were so sweet and made our product perfect! Thank God for a truly healthy food in Greystone. I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!!

name: David Aaron Sheetz
text: DO NOT GO HERE IF YOU VALUE COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS. First I'll start with saying they have a sign that specifically asks for Yelp and Google reviews so here you go! The two employees working were both maskless this specific time I visited Clean Juice. I have been here on and off throughout the pandemic and have seen masks being worn sometimes and not others...Why can't this place enforce the ONE THING that scientists have PROVEN is effective? Why can't they stay consistent with their policies? This is grade A poor business management. Also there is a statewide mandate still active. USE LOGIC AND REASON OR LOSE MY BUSINESS. Food is great, don't kill your business by failing your employees and customers.

resp.text:
Hey David,
Our policy is for employees to wear masks. We will continue to have this policy until the governor drops the mandate. Thanks for feedback.

name: Dawn Willett
text: The coffee smoothie was delicious. The staff is very friendly.

resp.text: Thanks Dawn!

name: Michael Johnson
text: Amazing atmosphere every time I come in. The staff is always friendly and professional! I have told all of my friends and coworker about Clean Juice!!!

resp.text: Thank you! We’re happy to serve.

name: Steven Mooney
text: Friendly staff and delicious smoothies and juices.  I didn't try the food, but The Coffee One and The Intense One were both great.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you enjoyed it!!

name: Satin Touch Experience
text: You better be ready for those shots oh my they help clean you out

name: Vinny
text: Their product is excellent, but pricey.  They are limiting their potential with a lot of the “in your face” religious stuff scattered throughout the store.  This is off-putting to a lot of people and getting even more so.   The employees are very nice and friendly, the store is immaculate and the product is great.  If they make it more middle of the road, (No “hey, look at me I’m a Christian” and some $5 or less options, customers would be lined up out the door.

name: Max Messer
text: I have had nothing but fantastic experiences at this location! The management is wonderful and always so friendly and welcoming. They remember my order and always suggest the best things on the menu with a great knowledge of all of the ingredients. I will definitely be coming back here as a regular!

name: Dr. Rebecca Warren
text: Just drove by here on a trip back home and we had such a great experience! The team of women working were so nice and very attentive. We appreciated their patience as I asked for multiple things out of the ordinary. Will be back!

name: Melissa McCollum
text: Love the smoothies and the customer service is excellent!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa!

name: Savannah Irwin
text: I love the atmosphere at Clean Juice. The staff and team at this location know how to make their guests feel welcome. The quality of the products is set apart, as well as the quality of the service provided. Love this store!!

name: Natalya Drake
text: Great customer service, amazing drinks, I’m so thankful I live close to them.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Glad you enjoyed it.

name: Shaundra Hudson
text: Love this place.  I literally used to drive to Huntsville, Al to get my juice cleanses.  So excited they are down the street. Juices are fresh and staff is amazing.  You cannot go wrong here, everything is healthy and organic.

resp.text: Hello Sha, we used to drive to Huntsville and Atlanta weekly too!! Now we have great juice right in our back yard. Thanks for the kind words and valuable feedback.

name: Richard Baxter
text: Our new favorite place! Organic and healthy juices and meals, a great atmosphere and friendly people, and a strong mission to bring health and wellness to their customers. Our whole family including the kids love their juices and smoothies and bowls. We will make this a regular stop during our week!

resp.text: Hello Richard, Thanks so much for your kind words! We're so glad to be part of the community and provide a healthy option to our area. Look forward to seeing you and your family!

name: Megan Hudson
text: hands down the best place to work💛 (and eat! can’t go wrong with anything!)

name: Troy Gigis
text: My family and I are so happy that you all are open. Your staff made a big difference in my experience. Everyone was so eager to help and kind. We love the cold press juices and your smoothies are excellent. We will keep coming back.

resp.text: Hey Troy, Thanks so much for coming in! So glad our team made you feel welcome, they are awesome. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Alisa Poole
text: Love love love your food and juices!!!

resp.text: Thanks Alisa! Glad you like it.

name: Nicholas Gregory
text: Wow what a staff! First time here, walked me through everything and gave recommendations. The owner of this location is very lucky to have this level of employees.

name: Marissa Miller
text: Had been a few times before the pandemic and the manager always was able to help me and describe why certain things are good for me and helped me greatly with learning what to put into my body. He always made good conversation and made me feel important and like they cared about my health. I came back the other day after learning they reopened and had a horrible experience. I asked about nutritional benefits and differences in proteins and they just tried to hand me a nutritional pamphlet and could not answer any specific questions about their products . I asked to speak to the man I normally spoke to and that he was the manager and I couldn’t remember his name.I was informed he was fired and I was talking to one of the managers who took his place. She was maybe 15-17 which makes no sense to me. She had no clue what she was talking about with regards to their menu and did not really help me at all and seemed angry that I was asking so many questions. After I finally ordered she left for another employee to make my smoothie and even the employee joked and  said don’t worry we miss our manager too! I laughed but was also semi shocked by that. I Was a regular now I will not be back.

resp.text: Hey Marissa, we are so sorry you didn't have a good experience. While we strive to always be able to answer the questions our guests need, many times our team may have to reference a guide book to give the proper answer. I believe we are all a little rusty as we navigate opening back up after all the craziness hit. Our goal is to always be learning. Again, we are sorry you had a negative experience and we do hope to see you back in in the future. If you do decide to come back in (which we hope you do), your next one will be on us.

name: Brad Louis
text: This place has gone way downhill since they reopened. It was great when they first opened always had good service, so I don’t know what happened maybe they changed management.

name: Alda Her
text: I love this place ❤️🥰 they have wonderful juices, smoothies and salads!! Always the friendliest service and delicious, healthy food choices. My goal is to try EVERYTHING on the menu 😂

resp.text: Hello Alda, Thanks so much for the kind words and feedback. If you need some help choosing what to try next, let us know. We're happy to help.

name: Erika VM
text:
Im very disappointed. I’m in 50s and trying so hard to stay healthy and keep my mask on in public. Where I live in AL, today we had the highest COVID spike on record. None of your three servers had masks and looked oblivious to my question (polite) why they didn’t. We are in the middle of a pandemic. I stated this concern on their ig and they blocked me. As they say below, posting on their ig concerns is not in their opinion acceptable. As any business knows,  social media is where people can comment positive or negative concerns. If companies delete anything that is not glowing it shows a refusal to truly address customer concerns. Why not publicly state your official policies. Any successful co will allow feedback —good or bad— so long as it’s not vulgar.  This refusal to care about customers health,  and then to not reply reasonably to feedback is not acceptable. There is no admission in your reply to me that there is any policy re this public health matter. Im appalled as a franchise that you allow this and I’m quite upset. I was a regular but no more. It appears that teenagers unmasked are calling the shots. If you are in the food industry in AL and watching the news you need to realize that this is unsafe.These unmasked kids have parents and grandparents and can be asymptomatic and pass it on to them, others and your customers. The employee stated “we don’t have to wear them.”  You are now saying they do?? It’s not clear. Did you change your policies yesterday? Was the employee making that up? For a store that prides itself on health, this is the biggest health crisis we have faced as a country in many many years.
This was the Greystone store in AL .

resp.text: Hello Erika, Thank you so much for your feedback. I'm sure you're aware that an Instagram post about our new app isn't the best place to give feedback about masks. Thats why the comments were deleted. Thank you for bringing your feedback here. Our staff has been wearing masks for most of the time since we've reopened and we will continue to wear masks as long as people are concerned over this matter.

name: Leslie Dollar
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PLACE! Everything is fresh and delicious, very high quality ingredients.  Staff is super helpful and nice.  Fabulous addition to Greystone area.

resp.text: Hey Leslie, Thanks so much for your awesome feedback! We're super happy you came in and hope to see you again real soon.

name: Leah Velasco
text: AHHH there was a problem with my money and basically they were so nice and reassuring 😭😭😭😭😭 sweetest thing ever omg

name: Brian Smith
text: Jeremiah, Monique, and the team at Clean Juice are committed to building long term relationships with their customers by exceeding expectations and getting to know people. If you are looking to transform your health I recommend that you visit Clean Juice today!

name: William Atchley
text: Everything I've gotten has been great and taste so fresh!

name: Richard Bowman
text: Awesome fresh made juices and salads. Wonderful staff, knowledgeable and friendly.

resp.text: Hey Richard, Thanks so much for coming and providing such great feedback! We can't wait to see you again soon.

name: Dr. Jessica All Natural Family Doc
text: Great food, great juices!

name: Gilberto Bravo Amaya
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent alternative

(Original)
Excelente alteenativa

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you. We appreciate your business.

(Original)
Gracias.  Apreciamos tu negocio.
